DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of HCP1301 capsule in patients with Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia and Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of HCP1303 Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter, randomized, double-blind, phase 3 clinical trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of HCP1303 capsule
DOC.criteria: At Visit 1 1. ≥50 age 2. BPH(Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia) + Total IPSS(International Prostate Symptom Score) ≥ 13 3. Abnormal Erectile function ≥ at least 3months based on screening date At Visit 2 1. Total IPSS ≥ 13 1. History of hypersensitivity to Tamsulosin or Tadalafil 2. History of allergy for Sulfonamide 3. PSA (Prostate Specific Antigen) ≥4ng/mL
